Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Ornamentation elements
Description: These ornamentation elements comprise glass beads of various shapes and sizes, which are blue, turquoise, dark brown, red, violet and golden. Shapes include ring-, cylinder- and oval-shaped beads. Their diametre varies from 2 mm to 11,55 mm.
